pages.txt: $(item)Sandwiches$() are one of the great ways to combine foods!$(br)Every sandwich needs to have $(item)2 slices of bread$() or $(item)toast$()!
pages.txt1: Along with bread you also need some food/ingredients to go in the $(item)sandwich$()!$(br)For example you could use some of the items on the next page.

pages.txt: You can use any of these or any other food you find in the world!$(br)But be careful when adding "deadly" foods as they will still effect you in bad ways!
